description: Get to see lots of larches!  Park at Lookout on 93South, 8kms from Highway 1.  Travel down to Vista Lake, then make way to Arnica Lake.  Go to Twin Lakes, or climb up Summit to have a view of Twin Lakes!
directions: Highway 1 West and take 93 South.  Travel 8kms to Lookout on Left side of highway.
title: Arnica Lake and Summit
